CustomField.description: Attachments have 'IsPrivate' field that limits access to owner and admins. ContentVersions related to records are not private. Enable this option to convert private attachments to files. Please consider your company's regulatory and security policies before enabling this option as it may expose data to new audiences.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Attachments have 'IsPrivate' field that limits access to owner and admins. ContentVersions related to records are not private. Consider your company's regulatory and security policies before enabling this option as it may expose data to new audiences.
CustomField.label: Convert Private Attachments?
